languages.text: {n}Ваш выстрел попадает точно в цель — по массивному конструкту с треском проносятся разряды молнии, силовое поле несколько раз мигает и рассеивается. За тяжелым металлическим гулом отовсюду вокруг доносятся глухие хлопки и вы видите, как один за другим расцветают порталы в варп, откуда к вам тянутся чудовищные обезображенные лапы.{/n} "Что ты наделал{mf||а}?! Будь ты проклят{mf||а}, мон-кай!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ваш выстрел попадает точно в цель — по массивному конструкту с треском проносятся разряды молнии, силовое поле несколько раз мигает и рассеивается. За тяжелым металлическим гулом отовсюду вокруг доносятся глухие хлопки и вы видите, как один за другим расцветают порталы в варп, откуда к вам тянутся чудовищные обезображенные лапы.{/n} "Что ты наделал{mf||а}?! Будь ты проклят{mf||а}, мон-кай!"
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: {n}Your shot finds its mark. Lightning charges run down the construct and the force field flickers a few times before dissipating. The heavy metallic hum is followed by a series of dull pops coming from every direction and you see warp portals bursting into bloom around you one after another and horrific, malformed claws reaching toward you from the other side.{/n} "What have you done? A curse upon you, mon-keigh!"

Будь ты проклят{mf||а}, мон-кай!"

languages.text: {n}Votre tir fait mouche. Des éclairs parcourent la structure et le champ de force vacille plusieurs fois avant de se dissiper. Le ronflement métallique est suivi d'une série de détonations et vous apercevez des portails sur le Warp s'ouvrir les uns après les autres autour de vous. D'horribles griffes difformes en surgissent et tentent de vous agripper.{/n} « Qu'avez-vous fait ? Soyez {mf|maudit|maudite}, mon-keigh ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Your shot finds its mark. Lightning charges run down the construct and the force field flickers a few times before dissipating. The heavy metallic hum is followed by a series of dull pops coming from every direction and you see warp portals bursting into bloom around you one after another and horrific, malformed claws reaching toward you from the other side.{/n} "What have you done? A curse upon you, mon-keigh!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre tir fait mouche. Des éclairs parcourent la structure et le champ de force vacille plusieurs fois avant de se dissiper. Le ronflement métallique est suivi d'une série de détonations et vous apercevez des portails sur le Warp s'ouvrir les uns après les autres autour de vous. D'horribles griffes difformes en surgissent et tentent de vous agripper.{/n} « Qu'avez-vous fait ? Soyez {mf|maudit|maudite}, mon-keigh ! »
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: {n}你精确地击中了目标。电弧窜到了抑制器上，力量闪烁了几下，消失了，随后，传来了金属般的轰鸣声，各个方向传来了沉闷的爆炸声，你周围出现了一扇又一扇亚空间传送门，无数畸形的利爪从另一边伸了过来。{/n}“你到底干了什么？我诅咒你，猴子！”
languages.original_text: {n}Your shot finds its mark. Lightning charges run down the construct and the force field flickers a few times before dissipating. The heavy metallic hum is followed by a series of dull pops coming from every direction and you see warp portals bursting into bloom around you one after another and horrific, malformed claws reaching toward you from the other side.{/n} "What have you done? A curse upon you, mon-keigh!"

traits.locale_text: {n}你一枪击中了目标。电弧窜到了抑制器上，力量闪烁了几下，消失了，随后，传来了金属般的轰鸣声，各个方向传来了沉闷的爆炸声，你周围出现了一扇又一扇亚空间传送门，无数畸形的利爪从另一边伸了过来。{/n}“你到底干了什么？我诅咒你，猴子！”
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: {n}あなたの射撃は命中した。電撃が建造物を走り、エネルギーフィールドは数回明滅したあとに消滅した。重々しい金属音が鳴り、あらゆる方向から鈍い破裂音が何度も聞こえてくる。歪みの門があなたの周囲で次々と開き、その向こう側からは恐ろしく変形した爪がこちらに向かって伸びてくるのが見える。{/n}「何をした？呪われろ、モン＝ケイめ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Your shot finds its mark. Lightning charges run down the construct and the force field flickers a few times before dissipating. The heavy metallic hum is followed by a series of dull pops coming from every direction and you see warp portals bursting into bloom around you one after another and horrific, malformed claws reaching toward you from the other side.{/n} "What have you done? A curse upon you, mon-keigh!"

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの射撃は命中した。電撃が建造物を走り、エネルギーフィールドは数回明滅したあとに消滅した。重々しい金属音が鳴り、あらゆる方向から鈍い破裂音が何度も聞こえてくる。歪みの門があなたの周囲で次々と開き、その向こう側からは恐ろしく変形した爪がこちらに向かって伸びてくるのが見える。{/n}「何をした？呪われろ、モン＝ケイめ！」
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: {n}Dein Schuss findet sein Ziel. Blitze durchziehen das Konstrukt und das Kraftfeld flackert mehrfach, bevor es sich auflöst. Einem heftigen metallischen Summen folgen aus allen Richtungen mehrere dumpfe Knallgeräusche und du siehst, wie um dich herum diverse Warpportale erscheinen und entsetzlich missgestaltete Klauen durch sie hindurch nach dir greifen.{/n} "Was habt Ihr getan? Soll Euch doch der Blitz treffen, Chem-Pan-Sey!"
languages.original_text: {n}Your shot finds its mark. Lightning charges run down the construct and the force field flickers a few times before dissipating. The heavy metallic hum is followed by a series of dull pops coming from every direction and you see warp portals bursting into bloom around you one after another and horrific, malformed claws reaching toward you from the other side.{/n} "What have you done? A curse upon you, mon-keigh!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Du landest mit deinem Schuss einen Volltreffer. Blitze durchziehen das Konstrukt und das Kraftfeld flackert mehrfach, bevor es sich auflöst. Einem heftigen metallischen Summen folgen aus allen Richtungen mehrere dumpfe Knallgeräusche und du siehst, wie um dich herum diverse Warpportale erscheinen und entsetzlich missgestaltete Klauen durch sie hindurch nach dir greifen.{/n} "Was habt Ihr getan? Soll Euch doch der Blitz treffen, Chem-Pan-Sey!"
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: {n}Tu disparo da en el blanco. Una descarga eléctrica recorre el constructo, y el campo de fuerza titila unos instantes antes de disiparse. El fuerte zumbido metálico da paso a una serie de chasquidos apagados que proceden de todas partes; varios portales a la disformidad se abren a tu alrededor uno tras otro, y unas espantosas garras deformes emergen desde el otro lado intentando atraparte.{/n} «¿Qué has hecho? ¡{mf|Maldito|Maldita} seas, mon-keigh!».
languages.original_text: {n}Your shot finds its mark. Lightning charges run down the construct and the force field flickers a few times before dissipating. The heavy metallic hum is followed by a series of dull pops coming from every direction and you see warp portals bursting into bloom around you one after another and horrific, malformed claws reaching toward you from the other side.{/n} "What have you done? A curse upon you, mon-keigh!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu disparo da en el blanco. Una descarga eléctrica recorre el constructo, y el campo de fuerza titila unos instantes antes de disiparse. El fuerte zumbido metálico da paso a una serie de chasquidos apagados que proceden de todas partes; varios portales a la disformidad se abren a tu alrededor uno tras otro, y unas espantosas garras deformes emergen desde el otro lado intentando atraparte.{/n} «¿Qué has hecho? ¡{mf|Maldito|Maldita} seas, mon-keigh!».
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: {n}Atışın hedefini buluyor. Yapıyı elektrik akımları kaplıyor; güç perdesi önce birkaç kez yanıp sönüyor, ardından da yok oluyor. Ağır, metalik uğultuyu her yönden gelen bir dizi cansız patlama sesi takip ediyor. Etrafında ardı ardına öteboyut portallarının açıldığını ve bunların diğer tarafından sana doğru dehşet verici, çarpık biçimlerdeki pençelerin uzandığını görüyorsun.{/n} "Sen ne yaptın? Lanet olsun sana mon-keigh!"
languages.original_text: {n}Your shot finds its mark. Lightning charges run down the construct and the force field flickers a few times before dissipating. The heavy metallic hum is followed by a series of dull pops coming from every direction and you see warp portals bursting into bloom around you one after another and horrific, malformed claws reaching toward you from the other side.{/n} "What have you done? A curse upon you, mon-keigh!"

Ağır, metalik uğultuyu, her yönden gelen bir dizi cansız patlama sesi takip ediyor ve etrafında ardı ardına öteboyut portallarının açıldığını ve bu portalların diğer tarafından sana doğru dehşet verici, çarpık biçimlerdeki pençelerin uzandığını görüyorsun.{/n} "Sen ne yaptın? Lanet olsun sana mon-keigh!"
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire
